The{HOLMETHORPE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE} covers about{SIXTY ACRES.}The land was originally used to extract sand. However the sand ran out and the land was used to build industrial units. Many small firms are now located on the estateand more new units are being built. The estate is successful and many businesses want to build factories there.
There are problems of access to the estate. Many lorries have to use{ {FRENCHES ROAD}and then drive through a narrow railway arch. They pass outside our school. This creates a lot of NOISE and POLLUTION as well as being quite DANGEROUS. JOHN McCARTNEY JULY 1985.
